abstract: Members of Congress ask for a formal review of how the State Department assigned an environmental impact study to a company with business ties to TransCanada.
snippet: Members of Congress ask for a formal review of how the State Department assigned an environmental impact study to a company with business ties to TransCanada.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers have called on the State Department's inspector general to investigate the department's handling of a crucial environmental study on the proposed Keystone XL pipeline and urged President Obama to delay a decision on the project until the report is completed.

headline.main: Lawmakers Seek Inquiry on Keystone XL Process
